Content.Text:
<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, welcome home! I was about to
have some snacks. Do you wanna have
some, too?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, welcome home! I was about to
have some snacks. Do you want to have
some, as well?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, I wanna hear some stories from
the time before you got married.
<PAGE>
How did you two start dating?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, I'd love to hear some stories
from the time before you got married.
<PAGE>
How did you two start dating?
I was surprised with a confession.
I said "I love you" first.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? I bet it was quite a surprise.
<PARENT>, I had no idea you were so cool!
<PAGE>
So <PARENT> liked you, too, right? What 
exactly did the trick?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's so romantic! <PARENT>, I didn't
know you were so popular!
<PAGE>
But that means <PARENT> liked you back!
What made up your mind?
Their looks
Their personality
Everything about them

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hahaha, really? That's a bit awkward.
Maybe I shouldn't have asked.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Teeheehee, is it true? Wow, I think I'm
blushing a little!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, <PARENT>, that's so awesome! You
were really cool!
<PAGE>
Listen, what did it feel like when you
were dating?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's so cute! <PARENT>, you were so
amazing!
<PAGE>
Tell me more! What did it feel like
when you were dating?
We were a tender couple
We were a lovey-dovey couple
We were a mature couple
We were an innocent couple

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sounds great! I want something like
that, too.
<PAGE>
I hope I can find someone that
makes me feel the same way.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's so dreamy! I want a relationship
like that, too!
<PAGE>
I wonder if I can ever find someone
like that for myself.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, how did you feel when I was born,
huh, <PARENT>?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, how did you feel when I was born,
<PARENT>?
I was really happy
I was really moved
I was relieved you were healthy

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hehe, I'm happy to hear that. Thank
you, <PARENT>.
<PAGE>
I'm really glad to have you for a
<PARENT>.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heehee, I'm happy to hear that. Thank
you, <PARENT>.
<PAGE>
I'm really glad to have you for a
<PARENT>.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, Mom!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, Mom!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome home, Dad!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, Dad!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You two are quite excited. I wonder why?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm ba-ack! What were you talking about
just now? I wanna know too!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm home, <CHILD_NAME>, <MYNAME>! Well
aren't you both excited! Won't you fill
me in?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, my dears. It seems like
you were having fun. What happened?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm home. It's sure lively here. What
were you talking about?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, I'm back. What were you
talking about in such high spirits? Can
you tell me too?

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm back, my babies! What is so funny?
I want to laugh with you guys too!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm home, you guys! You two are so
peppy! What were you talking about?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm back. You look... so cheerful.
What are you... talking about?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm back from work. You two seem to
be having a good time. What have you
been talking about?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm home, pumpkin, sweetie pie! Why are 
you in such a good mood? Did something
good happen?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My little <MYNAME>, <CHILD_NAME>, I'm
home. What were you talking about that
has you both so worked up?
